articles.author: Scott Simon, Alina Selyukh
articles.title: Americans are spending more, but big chain stores say financial 'uncertainty' remains - WUSF Public Media
articles.description: Americans are spending money and shopping a lot. But according to recent retail reports, big chain stores are worried about the year to come. They say there's still a lot of uncertainty ahead.
articles.content:
Americans are spending money and shopping a lot. But according to recent retail reports, big chain stores are worried about the year to come. They say there's still a lot of uncertainty ahead.
